ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Rain then Slight Chance Light Snow
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Rain between 7am and 2pm, then a slight chance of snow between 2pm and 3pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 21 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 15 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

state.message: Sorry we're currently closed but we will reopen Monday, January 2nd from 7 - 10PM. Check us out on Facebook.
state.preMessage: In memory of Nicholas Lordi, who passed away on Nov 4th. Nick was a supporter of the Information Age Learning Center (InfoAge) and and the IXR/CDL makerspace. His family asks that if you are so moved, you make a donation to support the expanded Makerspace program at InfoAge..
state.postMessage:
We will be closed on Sunday December 25th and Monday December 26th
May everyone have safe and happy Holiday season.
To get current updates subscribe to our CDL Mail list or cdl+subscribe@groups.io..
state.blogUpdate: (Title: Makerspace near me ... Can't find CDL - Updated: Oct. 05, 2022)
